page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS-PORTPATRICK.
page.content: Artists,if few at present,produce quality work. Three craftpersons earn a living by selling their wares in Portpatrick. Christine Campbell and Frank Harris established{The Lighthouse Pottery}and produce hand-thrown,high-fired porcelain and stonework,both domestic and decorative.Commissions are undertaken for local hotels and private individuals. In{The Copper Wheel}Ronald Farquhar executes glass engraving, using a spinning copper wheel coated with carbon,oil and paraffin abrasive to inscribe the glass. Pat Auld,painting as a hobby,is an artist of some renown,exhibiting annually with the Royal Institute and Water Colour Society of Artists.
